title: Number of frontend denied requests is high
description: A client request can be rejected at the frontend by HAProxy and will not be forwarded to a backend server. This monitor tracks anomalies in the request denial rate for HAProxy frontends, on different hosts, to identify security issues.

definition.message:
The number of frontend denied requests due to security restrictions for host: {{host.name}} is above normal.

A malicious attacker or misconfigured application could be to blame. More information on designing ACLs for HAProxy can be found in the [Introduction to HAProxy ACLs blog post](https://www.haproxy.com/blog/introduction-to-haproxy-acls/).
definition.name: [HAProxy] High number of frontend denied requests for host: {{host.name}}
definition.query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:haproxy.frontend.denied.req_rate{*} by {host}, 'agile', 2, direction='above', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='daily') >= 1
